unansweredQuestions.problem: How to declare investments on AcePayXpress?
Is there a tech spec template?

latestAnsweredQuestions.problem: What's the full form of MTU?
latestAnsweredQuestions.answer: Monthly transacting Users (Transacted in the last calendar month).

latestAnsweredQuestions.problem: What's the full form of TPV?
latestAnsweredQuestions.answer: Total Payment Volume (TPV = GMV + Payouts), could also mean third party validation.

latestAnsweredQuestions.problem: What's the full form of GMV?
What's the full form of CAW?

Where can I find Competency Framework for SDEs?
What's the contact number for medical emergency?
latestAnsweredQuestions.answer:
Here is the link to Medical Insurance Policy Document: https://alpha.razorpay.com/repo/medical-insurance-2.
In case of emergencies, please contact SPOC:
Razorpay: Deeksha - +91 70192 88367 (deeksha.shetty@razorpay.com),
TPA: Vaibhav - 9582537577 (vaibhav_k@emedlife.in).

Flexi Reimbursements can be claimed every month on Acepay Xpress. The claim window is open between 1st to 15th of every month. Please raise your query through a Helpdesk ticket on AcepayXpress Portal for further assistance. https://app.acepayxpress.com/HRMS2020/Razorpay/Login.aspx?CID=Razorpay
